Text: Hello again Zayson, best regards! THANK YOU!

Carbon69,  LOL?

EVERY password is working and it will work forever if you have an interactive firewall., and if you don't it will start annoying barrage of "pirated software.." messages. Then you'll simply learn lesson- uninstall/install and put the "must have" firewall. Download fresh software every 4 months and you're OK.
I registered 3 computers with the same password! Eyooo Zayson - thanks a ton!

What did you mean about this:
"Download fresh software every 4 months and you're OK."

If i understood correctly you're saying that i can't update TU but i can download and install fresh software...if i already have TU installed and running  i have to still install it...right?

TheAslan,

Well- yes..

If you prevent software from updating (you should do it always) maybe you'd like to update it manually at some point.. I wrote four months because that would be logical time for TuneUp to integrate few fixes.. Most of the crucial updates of the legal software reinstall the application anyway.
